quiz.question: When attending a social gathering, you:

options.0: Start conversations with strangers and enjoy mingling
options.1: Prefer to stay with people you know and avoid large groups

options.0: Create a detailed itinerary and stick to it
options.1: Go with the flow and decide as things come up

options.0: Focus on practical solutions and facts

options.1: Compassionate and considerate of others' feelings

quiz.question: When working on a project, you:

options.0: Like to finish ahead of deadlines and stay organized
options.1: Feel more comfortable working closer to the deadline

options.0: Spending your weekend with a big group of friends
options.1: Spending your weekend quietly at home or with a close friend

options.0: Speak your thoughts as they come to mind
options.1: Think before speaking and choose your words carefully

quiz.question: Your decisions are usually based on:

options.1: You have flexibility and can adapt to changes

quiz.question: When working in a team, you:

options.0: Prefer to lead and organize tasks
options.1: Prefer to contribute quietly without taking charge

quiz.question: When faced with a decision, you:

options.1: A bit messy but you know where things are

quiz.question: When talking about ideas, you prefer:

options.1: Experiment and figure it out as you go
